article.title: U.S. Air Force Extends Battlefield Airborne Communications Node Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Information Systems, San Diego, California, was awarded a $34 million contract modification, which will provide for an extension on the maintenance and support of the Battlefield Airborne Communications Node payload in support of overseas contingency operations.Â Electronic Systems Command/Airborne Networks Division, Hanscom Air Force Base, Massachusetts, is the contracting activity.
